item.description:
Turning the Key: Partnering for Profit

Join us in October for our monthly networking and education event, Turning the Key, with Jeff Howard, real estate investor and partnering pro.

In Jeff's first 30 months of real estate he successfully purchased 15 properties in 3 states totaling over $3.2 million with no money down, and he currently invests in real estate full time!

You might be surprised to learn that working alone is actually costing you a heck of a lot more money then you might think. Jeff will share his secrets on how you might still be able to get paid on a deal you recently had to walk away from because you did not have the knowledge, resources or capital to pull it off.

Topics include:

* How partners actually ADD VALUE to your deals

* How and where to find these partners

* How partnering can exponentially INCREASE your bottom line - NOT cut into it!

* Debunking the myths about why partners are NOT a good idea

* How to determine what your partner should receive for their contribution... it is not always an even distribution!

* Whether you can't seem to buy that first property, or you just aren't earning enough to quit your J.O.B., if you are not where you want to be in your real estate investing career, Jeff will show you how to get there and how to get there FAST!


Pre-Register for Turning the Key and save $5.00!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Turning the Key: Partnering for Profit
